markdownRemark.html:
BP_Action_MovingPlatform

Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Maps/Demo/Actions/BP_Action_MovingPlatform

.. cpp:class:: BP_Action_MovingPlatform : public BP_Action_C

Companion action to BP_Interact_Mover for moving a platform to a location, attaching any unit standing on the platform and moving it along.
